mapper.insert: insert into bas_alipayfw_pay_order(id, partner_id, customer_id, mobile, customer_name, agent_id, money, source_type, source_id, order_status, handle_time, memo, create_time) values(#{id}, #{partnerId}, #{customerId}, #{mobile}, #{customerName}, #{agentId}, #{money}, #{sourceType}, #{sourceId}, #{orderStatus}, #{handleTime}, #{memo}, #{createTime})
